alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 12:56PM MST until January 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Flathead Valley, Flathead Lake, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will cause very slick conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
